definition: "hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
abbr. for Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region 寧夏回族自治區|宁夏回族自治区[Ning2 xia4 Hui2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1]/abbr. for Nanjing 南京[Nan2 jing1]/surname Ning
to unscrew/to twist off (a lid)/to turn on (a faucet)/to switch on (by turning a knob)/to turn (a door handle)/to wrench apart
to twist together to form a rope/(fig.) to unite/to work together

sentences.english: Mark twisted the gun from Don's hand with ungentle force.
sentences.chinese: 马克用不温和的力量拧来自君的手枪。

sentences.english: Please lower your brows and draw them together.
sentences.chinese: 请放低你的眉毛，将他们拧在一起。

sentences.english: The base of the lamp unscrews for wiring and mounting.
sentences.chinese: 台灯的底座可以拧开来进行布线和安装。

sentences.english: Put the cap back on the toothpaste.
sentences.chinese: 把盖子重新拧在牙膏管上。

sentences.english: He holds a wolf by the ears.
After I have a complete circle cut around the peach, I twist it to release the peach from the pit.
sentences.chinese: 当我切完一个圈，轻轻一拧，桃肉就从核上掉下来了。

sentences.english: The twenty-two twins twisted wrists twice on the Christmas Eve.
sentences.chinese: 二十二个孪生子在圣诞前夜拧了两次手腕。

sentences.english: The vice is bolted to the work-bench.
sentences.chinese: 老虎钳是用螺栓拧在工作台上的。
他的捏拧擦伤了桃子的表面。

sentences.english: The vice is bolted to the work-bench .
sentences.chinese: 老虎钳是用螺栓拧在工作台上。

sentences.english: The pain. twirling must be in a straight way, and twisting or curving must be avoided. avoided.
sentences.chinese: 捻动时要沿直线前进，不可拧转或歪斜。

sentences.english: Hung Chao and the " emissaries s " from the design of such information .
sentences.chinese: 洪潮和“使者拧”，从这些资料的设计。

sentences.english: He closed the door so hard that he wrenched the handle off.
sentences.chinese: 他关门用力过猛，边门把手也拧了下来。

sentences.english: Gideon rose early the next day; he squeezed the fleece and wrung out the dew--a bowlful of water.
sentences.chinese: 将羊毛挤一挤，从羊毛中拧出满盆的露水来。

sentences.english: However, there?s more to it than just inferring concepts.
sentences.chinese: 然而，？拧多给它不仅仅是推理的概念。

sentences.english: C. Match the main rocker arm with the door closer and screw down the screws.
sentences.chinese: 组合主摇臂和闭门器的主体并拧好螺丝。

definition: to turn/to twist/to wring/to sprain/to swing one's hips
to pinch (with one's fingers)/to knead/to make up
to pick (flowers)/to pinch/to nip/to pinch off/to clutch/(slang) to fight
to seize/to clutch/to grab firmly and pull
to unscrew/to twist off (a lid)/to turn on (a faucet)/to switch on (by turning a knob)/to turn (a door handle)/to wrench apart
to release/to let go/to loosen/to untie/to come loose
to protrude/to stick out/to pout (also written 噘)/to embarrass (people)
to wind around/to wrap round/to coil/tangle/to involve/to bother/to annoy
to break off or break open sth with one's hands/(fig.) to break off (a relationship)
erhua variant of 使勁|使劲[shi3 jin4]
